data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 on latest Canary (0.0.153)
data.actual_result: the settings updated, but the modal stays there, and can only be closed by clicking outside it.
data.short_description: "Done" in channel settings not closing modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with the ability to change channel permissions. - Change the settings. - Click the Done button.
